name: Disposal (samb0t)
description:
You wake up in a scary facility full of gruesome mutant creatures. Wuh oh!

BEAR IN MIND WHEN PLAYING: There are some minor issues with UI and different screen resolutions, if the top and bottom of the screen seem lighter than the rest, sorry!

Controls: WASD to move, shift to sprint, space to jump, left mouse to attack, 1&2 to switch weapons.

Credits:

Programming & Modeling: samb0t (the user who uploaded this)

2D Art: Xio JJJ (swordrulerxio.tumblr.com)

Sound effects & ambience: Jimmy (Jimmy#7514 on discord)

Warning: Minor suicide themes
